I’m Chelsea Otakan. I’m a product designer living in lovely San Francisco. I'm currently working on extending affordable credit as Design Director at Vouch. I lurve design, economics, open source, red pandas, snowboarding, karaoke, and the color #5E477D.

People like to call me Chexee.

You can find me on Twitter, Dribbble, GitHub, LinkedIn, Facebook, Runkeeper, Spotify, and Medium.
